scripts.build-ecdsa: mkdir -p build/ecdsa/release && napi build --features ecdsa --release build/ecdsa/release
scripts.build-ecdsa:debug: mkdir -p build/ecdsa/debug && napi build --features ecdsa build/ecdsa/debug
scripts.build-eddsa: mkdir -p build/eddsa/release && napi build --features eddsa --release build/eddsa/release
scripts.build-eddsa:debug: mkdir -p build/eddsa/debug && napi build --features eddsa build/eddsa/debug
scripts.build-schnorr: mkdir -p build/schnorr/release && napi build --features schnorr --release build/schnorr/release
scripts.build-schnorr:debug: mkdir -p build/schnorr/debug && napi build --features schnorr build/schnorr/debug
scripts.build-cggmp: mkdir -p build/cggmp/release && napi build --features cggmp --release build/cggmp/release
scripts.build-cggmp:debug: mkdir -p build/cggmp/debug && napi build --features cggmp build/cggmp/debug
